Welcome to WhimsyLabs

Award-winning virtual laboratory software for STEM education

WhimsyLabs provides interactive virtual lab software for Biology, Chemistry, and Physics. Our online lab simulations enhance STEM education in schools across the EU.

Our Features

Realistic Physics Simulations

Experience true-to-life physics in our virtual laboratory environment.

AI-Driven Assessment

Intelligent assessment tools that adapt to student learning.

Cross-Platform Accessibility

Access from any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile.

Immersive STEM Experiments

Conduct experiments safely in a virtual environment.

See WhimsyLabs in Action
